name: Escape Route: The Adventures of Eric Hawthorne
overview: The Apex Detective Agency has been assigned the case of recovering the rare Acme Diamond, which has been stolen by the infamous Icelady! The chief has assigned you, Eric Hawthorne, to the case. Escape Route is a combination of the B-Movie genres of the 50s and 60s, and the arcade, strategy and board games of your youth. (Taken from original ad copy.)
